verbs.description: Trump [V: has] boosted cooperation with Taiwan to counter China , but Beijing wants the US to know that it sees the island as more than just a geopolitical chess piec
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: boosted] [ARG1: cooperation with Taiwan] [ARGM-PRP: to counter China] , but Beijing wants the US to know that it sees the island as more than just a geopolitical chess piec
[ARG0: Trump] has boosted cooperation with Taiwan to [V: counter] [ARG1: China] , but Beijing wants the US to know that it sees the island as more than just a geopolitical chess piec
Trump has boosted cooperation with Taiwan to counter China , but [ARG0: Beijing] [V: wants] [ARG1: the US to know that it sees the island as more than just a geopolitical chess piec]
Trump has boosted cooperation with Taiwan to counter China , but Beijing wants [ARG0: the US] to [V: know] [ARG1: that it sees the island as more than just a geopolitical chess piec]
Trump has boosted cooperation with Taiwan to counter China , but Beijing wants the US to know that [ARG0: it] [V: sees] [ARG1: the island] [ARG2: as more than just a geopolitical chess piec]
